Class tester

  • java.lang.Object
    • tester

  • public class tester
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the testing class for the vending machine. It has 4 options of drinks to select. User can pay with credit or debit card that is linked already in the database of this machine. By default Credit cards start from 7777 to 7786. 2 cards are invalid card numbers: 7779 and 7782. By default Credit cards start from 7787 to 7796. 2 cards do not have enough balance: 7790 and 7794. By default all the cards have pin number: 1111 User can either be a customer or an operator to restock the machine. In order to restock the machine, it has to be shut down once which requires a pin. By default that pin is 1111. Before shutting down, the machine prints the result of sales. All the messages and questions are displayed to the user with the help of jOptionPane
    Author:
    Harmanjit Randhawa

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • initialiseList

        public static void initialiseList(int num)
        This method initialises all the lists of credit, debit, coffee, water, tea and cola list. It randomly sets 2 debit and credit cards to invalid state.
        Parameters:
        num - Number of items in each list

      • restock

        public static void restock()
        This method will add new items to each arraylist if the number of items are less than capacity

      • transaction

        public static boolean transaction(double amount)
        This method asks user for payment option and card details. If the transaction is successful it returns true else false
        Parameters:
        amount - This is the price of the drink selected
        Returns:
        Returns true if transaction is successful else false

      • getInput

        public static java.lang.String getInput(java.lang.String str)
        This method displays the string parameter and asks the user to input some value
        Parameters:
        str - This is the question asked to user
        Returns:
        Returns the input by user

      • checkCreditValidity

        public static boolean checkCreditValidity(int cardNumber,
                                          int pin,
                                          double amount)
        This method looks for the card number in the arraylist of credit cards. Once found it calls for the transaction method in the credit card class.
        Parameters:
        cardNumber - Account number for the user's credit card
        pin - Pin for that card
        amount - Amount of the drink selected
        Returns:
        Returns true if transaction is processed otherwise returns false

      • checkDebitValidity

        public static boolean checkDebitValidity(int cardNumber,
                                         int pin,
                                         double amount)
        This method looks for the card number in the arraylist of debit cards. Once found it calls for the transaction method in the credit card class.
        Parameters:
        cardNumber - Account number for the user's credit card
        pin - Pin for that card
        amount - Amount of the drink selected
        Returns:
        Returns true if transaction is processed otherwise returns false

        public static java.lang.String drinkSelection()
        Asks user to select one of the 4 drinks
        Returns:
        row number for the selected drink

      • getPrice

        public static double getPrice(int row)
        This method gets the price of the drink
        Parameters:
        row - This is the number of the row of the drink selected by the user
        Returns:
        Returns the price of the particular drink

      • removeDrink

        public static void removeDrink(int option)
        This method is used to remove a drink after the transaction is successful
        Parameters:
        option - This is the drink to be removed
